resources.string: By checking the checkbox and selecting the Button below, I agree to the Terms And Conditions applied and also agree to pay the total amount shown, which includes, taxes, GST and service charges.

We heard you guys


* Updated with new exciting places and resolved bugs.

* We have added more images of places and hotels to excite you and letting you know more about the places visually.

* You can retry the cancelled orders and book the same hotel that you tried to order.

* Settings are added with more usable options (Like clear app cache, notifications, etc).

* The user can download your ordered hotel invoice pdf from the booking summary page.
Dont forget to fill up the required details !!
